import React from 'react'; import './category.css' export function Categories(props) { const handleSearch = (event) => { const search = event.target.value if (search) { setFilteredClubs(clubs.filter((club) => club[2].toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || club[4].toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()))) } else { setFilteredClubs(clubs) } } return (
{/*

); } export default Categories;
